conbody.p: A chained activity is used if the task is chained to one or more previous tasks to be executed consecutively by the same participant. This means that the participant can access this task immediately after the previous task (within the same pool) without going back to the work list. The two or more workflows are viewed as only one business task in the Triple'A Plus Web User Interface.
In the workflow monitoring the two activities are both displayed in the list.
